page.title: 16THE VILLAGE HALL COMMITTEE
page.content: {THE VILLAGE HALL COMMITTEE}was set up in 1978 after an open meeting to discuss the closure of the village hall. The committee runs the {VILLAGE {HALL }and the {MEMORIAL HALL}. Both of these halls have the {PARISH COUNCIL } as trustees. It is the committee's function to raise money to run and maintain the halls. One of the first items was to start a Century Club. Dances are organised as are Cheese and Wine parties. Two or three times a year,Pentabus, a travelling theatre group, perform plays, sketches and at Christmas, a pantomime. The committee is made up of representatives of the various organisations in the village and of people who are interested in keeping the hall for the use of the village.
